भारत १९४७ साली स्वतंत्र झाला.bhārat 1947 sālī svatantra jhālā.India became independent in the year 1947.
to come to mind, occur (as a thought or idea), suggest
to swell, to have an inordinate desire
leave, leave of absence, Synonym: रजा (raj̈ā), holiday

to leave, नितीन भारत सोडून गेला.nitīn bhārat soḍūn
place, position, location, Synonym: जागा (j̈āgā), status

by oneself, मी हे काम स्वतः करीन.mī he kām svataḥ karīn.I

weather, (meteorology) air mass, climate, air, wind

yes, हो, मी भारतीय आहे।ho, mī bhārtīy āhe.Yes, I am

दोन (dona). Represents the number 2 (two) in the Devanagari script.
तीन (tīna). Represents the number 3 (three) in the Devanagari script.
चार (chār). Represents the number 4 (four) in the Devanagari script.
पाच (pāch). Represents the number 5 (five) in the Devanagari script.
सहा (sahā), the number 6 (six) in the Devanagari script.
Represents the number 7 (seven) in the Devanagari script.
The fourteenth vowel in Marathi, used to transcribe English words.
